name: Seattle Public Relations
tagline: Seatle PR, Digital, Creative & Marketing Agency
description:
Seattle Public Relations has enjoyed over 20 years of helping maintain the reputations of those willing to take a stand.
Couched in a vibrant tech-savvy environment, our workers have a combined 45 years of experience from tech giants as well as conventional media companies. We’ve become the Pacific Northwest’s most trusted public relations firm, with a focus on online reputation. We steer your online audience away from your disputes and towards your accomplishments, and the heart of your message.
